©2022 Merit Medical
Environmental 
Sustainability 
As a leading global manufacturer of medical devices, 
Merit Medical plays a significant role in contributing to a 
sustainable future. Our core beliefs and our goal to be the 
most customer-focused company in healthcare are at the 
heart of everything we do. We strive to offer superior safe 
and effective products in a sustainable manner, providing 
for the health of our customers and the health of our 
communities. We understand that sound environmental 
practices are beneficial to our business and to our 
stakeholders, both now and in the future.
